resources.string: Please remenber to sign out when exiting the building

All visitors must have authorisation to enter any area where public is excluded.

 Where required or designated, approved safety equipment must be used.

 All areas must be kept clear and free of hazards.

 Be aware of moving hazards such as vehicles/fork lifts and mobile plant.

 Follow recommended procedures for handling hazardous materials.

 Keep aisles, exits, driveways and fire-extinguisher accesses clear.

 Before entering any area observe safety signs and rules.

 Report all accidents and incidents, including near misses to the Manager.

 Be fully aware of evacuation and emergency procedures.

 Maintain an appropriate standard of housekeeping and general hygiene.
Please write the full name of all the Members Seperate names by Comma(,)

Wet/Slippery Floors - Keep floor clean & dry. Wear non slip shoes

 Electricity - Follow insulation procedures & turn off and unplug power supply when working on electrical equipment.

 Sharp Surfaces - Many edges can be sharp. Check carefully before starting. Report unsafe edges to Manager.

 Traffic/Fork Lift operation - Be aware of moving hazards such as vehicles & forklifts. All areas must be kept clear at all times.

Evacuate through nearest exit when instructed by manager or on alarm \–
